name: Golf Europe
goal: To engage with the European Parliament and European Commission on behalf of the game of golf in order to better understand and contribute towards the legislative process and how it might impact on golf.  To disseminate information on EU legislation down to the national golf federations in Europe so that they are able to engage on a national basis.  To promote the game of golf at European legislative level and the benefits golf can bring to issues of concern to the EP and EC.
interests: Climate Action, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Sport
euInitiatives:
Erasmus+
Green Week
European Week of Sport
Legislation on pesticides, Sport and Tourism, Water Scarcity, Business and Biodiversity, and Energy Efficiency
